Created an attachment (id=79047)
Fix

Build ID: M20070913-1500

Steps To Reproduce:
Current code snippet will result in NPE if there is no trait with name provided:
IMetadataContextResolver mdContextResolver = IStructuredDocumentContextResolverFactory.INSTANCE.getMetadataContextResolver( context );
List proposals =  mdContextResolver.getPropertyValue( "some-not-present-trait-name" );
